project1.title: Nutshell - Chufas
project1.description: Nutshell is a dashboard for people to organize their daily weather, events, articles, and chat messages.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, Sass, JavaScript, Bootstrap 4, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, and Webpack
